text: I am trying to set myself up to be able to debug code as it's running (Followed installation steps at <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/docs/dev-setup/install.md>): At the moment I have LXDE desktop environment on top of the vagrant box that allows me an IDE to work with. Is that the best approach for this ? or is there a better way to  do this with minimal changes to the vagrant image. Also, sorry if this is not the correct channel for this sort of question or has been addressed earlier.

attachments.title: hyperledger/fabric
